title: Senior Care Package
description: Thoughtfully designed wellness package for older adults focusing on healthy aging, vitality, and preventive care. Includes gentle nutritional support, comprehensive health screening, and thorough medical assessment.

included.name: Vitality & Immunity IV
included.description: Gentle hydration with essential vitamins B12, C, and minerals to support energy, immune function, and bone health

included.name: Senior Wellness Panel
included.description: Comprehensive testing including vitamin deficiencies, thyroid function, kidney/liver health, and key age-related markers

included.name: Geriatric Health Assessment
included.description: Thorough physical examination, medication review, fall risk assessment, and personalized wellness plan
